Name: Semantic Header
Description: Headers provide a short summary of content

Definitions.Descriptive Headers: Headers may have sub headers containing further context to the section
Definitions.Icon: A header can be formatted to emphasize an icon
Definitions.Page Headings: Headers may be oriented to give the heirarchy of a section in the context of the page
Definitions.Content Headings: Headers may be oriented to give the importance of a section in the context of the content that surrounds it
Definitions.Disabled: A header can show that it is inactive
Definitions.Attached: A header can be attached to other content
Definitions.Floating: A header can sit to the left or right of other content
Definitions.Colors: A header can be formatted with different colors
Definitions.Dividing: A header can be formatted to divide itself from the content below it
Definitions.Block: A header can be formatted to create a block
Definitions.Inverted: A header can have its colors inverted for contrast
